DOC.brief_summary: Prospective comparison of standard therapy in liver cirrhosis versus standard therapy plus intensified hemodynamic monitoring using the PiCCO system.
DOC.brief_title: PiCCO Guided Therapy in Liver Cirrhosis
DOC.detailed_description: Patients presenting with advanced liver cirrhosis will receive either standard treatment or standard treatment plus hemodynamic monitoring with the PiCCO device. Fluids and vasoacitve drugs will be administered according to the measurements over a period of 5 days.
DOC.criteria: Liver cirrhosis ChildPughScore > 7 Ascites > 500 ml Coronary heart disease Apoplexia < 6 months ago Vasculitis Thrombosis Arterial occlusive disease > stadium II
